description.@en: “When the chips are down,” as they say, I tend to get a little more than agitated. If not only because I have difficulty forming words, but because no one can seem to understand me when I am being perfectly clear!

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: You must flip the results to fail all Skill Tests that rely on your ability to barter, bargain or strike monetary deals in your favor.
